tableGroups.title: DataTable Virtualization Props
tableGroups.description: Props for enabling and configuring row virtualization for large datasets.

items.name: enableVirtualization
items.description: Enable row virtualization. Only renders visible rows plus a buffer, dramatically improving performance with large datasets.

items.name: estimateRowHeight
items.description: Estimated height of each row in pixels. Used to calculate scroll position and virtual window. Use average height if rows vary.

items.name: maxHeight
items.description: Maximum height of the table container. Required for virtualization to work properly. Set a fixed height for best results.

items.name: enableStickyHeaderOrFooter
items.description: Keep table header fixed while scrolling. Highly recommended when using virtualization to maintain column visibility.

items.name: enablePagination
items.description: Must be set to false when using virtualization. Virtualization and pagination are mutually exclusive.
